segments.text: This kitchen is a ticking time bomb of small disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, there's the sink, relentlessly gushing water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate is completely oblivious to this flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so narrow, she literally has a foot in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, behind her, the children are engaged in their own risky escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to fall, I'm almost certain of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly; I can't believe it's still upright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little angry that the woman isn't paying more attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are so many things that could go wrong in the next few seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a real mess and injury is very high here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone comes out of this unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR
